content: I think I'll start with the books, maybe "Monet: The Master of Light" or "Claude Monet: Life and Art". I'd like to learn more about his life, especially his relationships and struggles. Speaking of struggles, I was wondering if you know anything about the current exhibits at the City Art Museum. I was there last Saturday with my colleague Rachel from work, and I was impressed by the "Impressionist Masters" exhibit. Are there any new exhibits coming up that I should check out?
